plot: He's the devil of the road. Some worship him, others want him dead. He is a legendary outlaw known only as "The Speed Demon", someone you would never want to meet on the streets.
title: The Speed Demon
plot_es: He's the devil of the road. Some worship him, others want him dead. He is a legendary outlaw known only as "The Speed Demon", someone you would never want to meet on the streets.
plot_en: He's the devil of the road. Some worship him, others want him dead. He is a legendary outlaw known only as "The Speed Demon", someone you would never want to meet on the streets.
